description: This file contains utility functions to extract and format version information from a dictionary object, specifically the 'version' key which can be a list or string, standardizing it into a list of three integers and providing a version string.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts and normalizes version information from a dictionary, handling different formats (list or string) and ensuring the version list has three elements (major, minor, patch).

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Creates a dot-separated string representation of the version obtained from GetVersion.
